reporter_caption.center: ORANGE CTY. SCH. BD. v. SWEENEY, 36 So.3d 89 (Fla.App. 1 Dist. 2010)

caption.center: ORANGE COUNTY SCHOOL BOARD and USIS, INC., Appellants, v. DORIS E.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from an order from the Judge of Compensation Claims. W. James Condry, II, Judge. Date of Accident: November 17, 1997.
opinion.attorneys:
Nancy A. Blastic of Moore, Peterson Zeitler, P.A., Orlando, for Appellants.
Douglas H. Glicken, Orlando, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
WOLF, KAHN, and ROBERTS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED
